TopicTitle: Laythecat is bestcat. (Chobit's house of madness) The one thread to rule them all!

Articles.Content:
Will their be a Excalibur II?

The Excalibur II's max setting should be "Kill Universe".

I know this thread is a random thread of sorts, but my god things have gotten amazingly hyper in here.

*bows before mod* When you give a monkey a pen, it will write on the wall.

The Excalibur II's max setting should be "Kill Universe".

Work on the Excalibur MkII has begun in factories on Polaris!

I know this thread is a random thread of sorts, but my god things have gotten amazingly hyper in here.

Is their a topic for this thread or is it just a off topic thread and so by definition, doesn't have a topic as off topic is on topic which is then off topic then that's on topic which makes you stuck in a infinite loop?

Originally this thread was an interesting conversation that was off topic for another thread and got split.

But now it's getting really insane in here, and kinda long.

Just take it easy you guys, although there is no set topic here that isn't an invitation to have a spamfest.

Originally this thread was an interesting conversation that was off topic for another thread and got split.

But now it's getting really insane in here, and kinda long.

Just take it easy you guys, although there is no set topic here that isn't an invitation to have a spamfest.

Still, it's just so fun!

Originally this thread was an interesting conversation that was off topic for another thread and got split.

But now it's getting really insane in here, and kinda long.

Just take it easy you guys, although there is no set topic here that isn't an invitation to have a spamfest.

Ah, man...
We should now all calm down then and wait for more people.
The Excalibur MkII is now finished!
Lets have some details then
Equipped with: red matter, lasers, time travel device to make paradoxes to destroy the universe, nukes, hydrogen bombs, red matter bombs, and big missiles.
Lets just wait for chobit to come and destroy it then.

Lets just wait for chobit to come and destroy it then.

Good plan. Enjoy the wait.

Good plan. Enjoy the wait.

*already bored*

*already bored*

Build a base on Laythe then?

That way we can be sure that Laythecats actually exist.
How would you try and land on the small amount of land on Lathye?

Build a base on Laythe then?

That way we can be sure that Laythecats actually exist.

Now I want to go to Laythe...
Oh. Wow. I step out to go see Into Darkness (side note - AHHHHHHH *fangirlisms!*) and I come back to see the universe destroyed. Good to know.

Oh. Wow. I step out to go see Into Darkness (side note - AHHHHHHH *fangirlisms!*) and I come back to see the universe destroyed. Good to know.

Nah, only the milky way. Good news is, airship has been landed. We're waiting for Chobit now.
Its not destroyed, its been rebooted. Anyway, did you like Into Darkness?

Nah, only the milky way. Good news is, airship has been landed. We're waiting for Chobit now.

Don't blame me for the Milky Way. *whistles*

Shut up, all of you!

I'm working on my "Orion"-class Heavy Attack Battlecruisers. Sort of based off Mass-effect, and Yamato. I'm trying to assemble a fleet here, dammit!

It's going to consist of the best parts of every sci-fi. To make the best of the best. Chobit can have some.
She has her own massive defence system we're still trying to understand and break.

Shut up, all of you!

I'm working on my "Orion"-class Heavy Attack Battlecruisers. Sort of based off Mass-effect, and Yamato. I'm trying to assemble a fleet here, dammit!

It's going to consist of the best parts of every sci-fi. To make the best of the best. Chobit can have some.

Um, okay. I can solve your problems! *fires the Excalibur MkII at your base of operations* Chobit is already strong enough!
Don't worry, we will find the weakness in chobits defences one day.
